title: I Am a Piece Of SHHHHH. HELP ME!
body:
I am a piece of crap.

I need to put an end to my toxic behavior but I feel... unable to do so without an intervention...

Help me stop getting chat bans, or I might forever be stuck in this endless cycle of being tormented and tormenting others unintentionally.

**Reds / Community - I NEED YOUR HELP!**
